resources.string:
War Thunder is a military simulation game that takes you to the skies, the battlefields, and the oceans of World War II and the Cold War. You can control a wide range of aircrafts, tanks, and warships, each with its own unique characteristics and capabilities. The game features realistic physics and dynamic weather, allowing you to experience the thrill of aerial combat and ground battles like never before.



The game features several game modes, including arcade battles, realistic battles, and custom battles. In arcade battles, you can quickly jump into the action and engage in fast-paced, action-packed battles with a simplified damage model. In realistic battles, you can experience the intensity of real-life combat with a more complex damage model and realistic flight physics. Custom battles allow you to create your own custom game rules and conditions.



War Thunder offers a massive online multiplayer experience, allowing you to join forces with players from all over the world and engage in epic battles on a massive scale. You can also participate in various events and missions, each with its own unique challenges and rewards. With its stunning graphics, realistic physics, and dynamic weather, War Thunder is the ultimate military simulation game for players who love action, strategy, and adrenaline.
